skins.shipDescription: Kongou-class fast battleship number four C Kirishima.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Kirishima, the youngest of the Kongou-class fast battleships. I once bombarded Henderson Field and that battleship South Dakota. Searchlights... and Type 3 Shells? ... Aha, hahaha...
skins.acquisition: I'm Kirishima, the fast battleship! Now, Commander, there's a long road ahead of us, and we should walk down it together!
skins.login: Commander, is there anything I can help with?
skins.details: Kongou brought me some tea. How about we drink it together?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Searchlights? Ahahahah... The battlefield is no stage.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Why I wear this mask? Hahah, think you can guess why?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Kongou, allow me to help... What? Y-you don't want any help, huh...
skins.secretaryTouch: Were you starting to feel lonely, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I'm right here, Commander. Face your partner square on if you're going to do that. Ahahah, look at you~ Now it's you who's embarrassed.

skins.shipDescription: Commander, enjoying school life is all fine and well, but we must not forget our duty... That said, what missions are waiting for us today?
skins.acquisition: Commander, enjoying school life is all fine and well, but we must not forget our duty... That said, what missions are waiting for us today?
skins.login: Commander, your necktie is crooked. Want me to straighten it out for you?
skins.details: Commander, how about we go flower-viewing later after school?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, if there's anything troubling you, you can always tell me.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I haven't picked a club to join yet... The Archery Club? That actually sounds pretty good... Huh? I'm "not suited for that"?

skins.shipDescription: Being in front of my sisters in this outfit is one thing, but it really is embarrassing to be wearing it in front of you, Commander. Um... ahem! What do you think? Since you're here, want to walk down to the beach together?
skins.acquisition: Being in front of my sisters in this outfit is one thing, but it really is embarrassing to be wearing it in front of you, Commander. Um... ahem! What do you think? Since you're here, want to walk down to the beach together?
skins.details: Seriously, you'll only ever find looks like this in fashion mags. It's an Eagle Union thing, according to Kongou...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hey, Commander, could you support me for a sec? ... Phew, it'll take some time to get used to these high heels.
skins.secretaryIdle2: A group photo? Sure thing. Hey, you suggested it, don't shy away from the camera. Okay, say "cheese!"
skins.secretaryIdle3: Need a break, Commander? All right, then let's head to Hiei's place and ask her to make us some tasty grub.
skins.secretaryTouch: You think it looks good on me? ... Sounds more like you're just poking fun at me for your own amusement.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander, this outfit really bothers me... so could you p-p-please stop...

skins.shipDescription: "Commander, bad luck for you, but you're just going to become another notch on my blade." Haha, just kidding, it's a joke! So, what do you think? My New Year's attire is pretty snazzy, isn't it?
skins.acquisition: "Commander, bad luck for you, but you're just going to become another notch on my blade." Haha, just kidding, it's a joke! So, what do you think? My New Year's attire is pretty snazzy, isn't it?
skins.login: It's not like every day can be a holiday, so let's reap the rewards of our achievements!
skins.details: Don't bring a knife to a gunfight! ...Well, don't bring a gun to a showdown between main batteries either~
skins.secretaryIdle1: South Dakota... is like a rampaging oni when she gets into a brawl... But, I won't lose out to her either~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ninja? Nah, I was just doing that because I thought it looked cool. We have actual ninjas in the fleet, and I wouldn't want to get on their bad side, y'know.
skins.secretaryIdle3: See, there's no issue with me showing my face here. After all, I'm with this commander here who is even more popular than me. Ahaha!
skins.secretaryTouch: Naww, I'm not like Hyuuga and Ise. I won't ask you to spar with me. Hahaha!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oho~? So, what are you going to do next? If you're all out of moves, then it's my turn to counterattack.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: You like my new hairstyle? When'd you notice?
